column4: as producers seek more drilling permits after crude prices hit an 11-week high over $51 a barrel last week.

column2: Potential Boeing Iran sale faces opposition in U.S. Congress WASHINGTON
column3: June 17 Two senior Republican House of Representatives lawmakers said on Friday they were concerned that Boeing Co's reported plans to sell aircraft to Iran could threaten U.S. national security and had requested more information from the company.
